column4: When my computer is on batterie, the screen become so dark ; How to get ride of this problem ?
on my laptop i hit the brightness controll keys a few times to brighten it up..
i've tried all the Fn* keys.. and nothing
yep. seen it work on some laptops and not on others. Id do a google for your specific laptop/vide4o card and see if theres some xorg.conf tweaks. or ways to get the keys working.
